00066 #ifndef TIMER_H_AUG_17_2005
00067 #define TIMER_H_AUG_17_2005
00068 
00069 #include <ostream>
00070 using namespace std;
00071 #include <sys/times.h>
00072 #include <unistd.h>
00073 
00074 class Timer 
00075 {
00076  public:
00077   Timer() 
00078   {
00079     times(&starttime_); 
00080     ticksPerSecond_ = sysconf(_SC_CLK_TCK);
00081   }
00082   ~Timer() {}
00083 
00084   void reset() { times(&starttime_); }
00085 
00086     // Returns the number of seconds of user time that have elapsed
00087   double time() 
00088   {
00089     struct tms endtime;
00090     times(&endtime);
00091     clock_t diff = endtime.tms_utime - starttime_.tms_utime;
00092     double seconds = ((double)diff) / ticksPerSecond_;
00093     return seconds;
00094   }
00095 
00096   static void printTime(ostream& out, const double& sec)
00097   {
00098     if (sec < 60)    out << sec << " secs";
00099     else 
00100     if (sec < 3600)  out << int(sec/60) << " mins, " << sec-int(sec/60)*60 
00101                          << " secs";
00102     else 
00103     if (sec < 86400) out <<  int(sec/3600) << " hrs, " 
00104                          << (sec-int(sec/3600)*3600)/60.0 << " mins";
00105     else             out << int(sec/86400) << " days, " 
00106                          << (sec-int(sec/86400)*86400)/3600.0 << " hrs";
00107   }
00108 
00109  private:
00110   struct tms starttime_;
00111   int ticksPerSecond_;
00112 };
00113 
00114 
00115 #endif
